snippet.title: Pokémon Art Academy - Trailer (Nintendo 3DS)
snippet.description:
Pokémon Art Academy is available here: http://ow.ly/xILgy

Time to grab your stylus, Pokemon fans! Pokémon Art Academy will arrive on Nintendo 3DS on 4th July! 

Facebook Nintendo 3DS: https://facebook.com/Nintendo3DSuk
Facebook Wii U: https://www.facebook.com/WiiU.co.uk
Twitter Nintendo UK: https://twitter.com/NintendoUK
YouTube Nintendo UK: http://ow.ly/pcJxF
